title: "Pirates' Ka'ai Tom: Playing time disappearing"
excerpt: "Tom will be on the bench for the fourth time in five games, and the Pirates appear to be viewing him as their fifth outfielder at this stage. All of Bryan Reynolds, Gregory Polanco, Ben Gamel and Phillip Evans appear to be ahead of Tom in the pecking order for playing time at either corner-outfield spot or in center."
